author: kylem
msg: Added now 'compileByExtension' option to the <apt> task that will run apt processing/compilation
sequentially on each of the input source extensions (the srcExtensions option value).  This is
useful in scenarios where building one type of component might depend upon the output of others.
A common example of this is trying to compile a control implementation that references control
JavaBean types that are the result of processing other control types in the same project.
Updated the control DRT composition tests to exercise this option.
